name: In Phrygia
description:
In Phrygia Is A Top Down Survival RPG In The Fantasy Land Of Phrygia!

The game will ultimately follow the journey of an adventurer trying to discover their past, what has happened to the land they reside in and what else might be residing with them - all while trying to survive. The land is mystical and the adventure will have to utilise magic, in the form of spells and magic machinery to move through their journey. The adventurer can choose whether to build up a strong base and use this to cultivate resources, or spend their time seeking new lands and claiming loot.
